title: Promos bugged along with missions?
body:
I'm in promos right now - to a new division. I lost my first match, won my 2nd, which didn't show up on match history, well, it's just bugged I thought, so I played another, and also won, but now my promos show me at 1/1 with 3 to play despite having played 3 games.

What's going on?
